A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: really extraordinary. Its true thats it is really different than the orginal films. But it doens't bother you because its refreshing. A new kind of story with new problems but there are still refrences to the past and thats just utterly amazing. This movie also suprises you in ways you coudln't imagine. This movie is there for the star wars fans who are open minded and appreciate new things. Because this movie was above my expectations.
